dialogue: We start shipping in two weeks.
That's not enough time to fix the known bugs.
When you say "bugs," that's sort of a gray area.
For example, a user might need several steps to do something that should only take one.
Or perhaps the interface is a bit unclear.
Or perhaps it can only be operated by a robot from the future who jacks into it and sends commands in zeros and ones.
I can't tell if you're agreeing with me or mocking me.
That's sort of a gray area.
